body:
Sethskye has been a Jr mod for over a month now, and I heard that Jr. mod trials last 3 weeks max.
So... what's happening with him? Is there a reason why he isn't being promoted / demoted, or why is it taking so long with him?
body_tagged:
Sethskye has been a Jr mod for over a month now, and I heard that Jr. mod trials last 3 weeks max.
So... what's happening with him? Is there a reason why he isn't being promoted / demoted, or why is it taking so long with him?
title: Promoted / Demoted?

replies.body: He took a break during the first part for a long time, so he's serving out the trial that we all served already, just at a later time.
replies.body_tagged: He took a break during the first part for a long time, so he's serving out the trial that we all served already, just at a later time.

replies.body: I've had Junior Moderator for 4 Months lmao, but that was because of the broken promotion/demotion command.
replies.body_tagged: I've had Junior Moderator for 4 Months lmao, but that was because of the broken promotion/demotion command.

replies.body:
He was on vacation during the majority of his trial. His fate is currently being decided by the senior staff.

No further comment.
replies.body_tagged:

No further comment.
